grading package

grading.utils module

grading.utils.apply_annotations_to_pdf(folder_path)[source]

Applies annotations to PDF files in the specified folder.

Parameters:

folder_path – The path to the folder containing PDF files and an “annotations.json” file.

grading.utils.run_annotate_ui(folder_path)[source]

Runs the annotation UI for the specified folder.

Parameters:

folder_path – The path to the folder containing PDF files to be annotated.

grading.pdf_highlighter module

class grading.pdf_highlighter.AnnotationJob(pdf_folder)[source]

Bases: object

Handles the annotation of PDF files.

add_active_box()[source]

Adds the active box to the current image boxes.

build_ui()[source]

Builds the user interface using NiceGUI components.

done()[source]

Saves the annotations and shuts down the application.

dump_svg()[source]

Dumps the current SVG string for the current page.

property filename_label

Returns the current PDF filename.

Returns:

The filename label string.

load_annotations()[source]

Loads annotations from a JSON file.

load_image_boxes()[source]

Loads the image boxes from the current SVG string.

Returns:

A list of SVG strings for each image box.

load_page()[source]

Loads the current page of the PDF file.

load_page_image()[source]

Loads the current page image from the PDF file.

load_pdf()[source]

Loads the current PDF file.

load_svg()[source]

Loads the SVG string for the current page.

Returns:

The SVG string.

mouse_handler(e: MouseEventArguments)[source]

Handles mouse events on the image.

Parameters:

e – The mouse event arguments.

next()[source]

Moves to the next page of the current PDF file.

next_pdf()[source]

Moves to the next PDF file.

property page_label

Returns the current page number and total number of pages.

Returns:

The page label string.

property pdf_index_label

Returns the current PDF index and total number of PDF files.

Returns:

The PDF index label string.

previous()[source]

Moves to the previous page of the current PDF file.

previous_pdf()[source]

Moves to the previous PDF file.

rebuild_current_svg_string()[source]

Rebuilds the current SVG string from the current image boxes.

remove_box_by_id(id)[source]

Removes a box by its ID.

Parameters:

id – The ID of the box to remove.

save_annotations()[source]

Saves annotations to a JSON file.

class grading.pdf_highlighter.Box(left, top, bottom=None, right=None, color='red')[source]

Bases: object

Represents a rectangular box with coordinates and color.

add_lower_right_corner(x, y)[source]

Adds the lower right corner to the box.

Parameters:

  • x – The x-coordinate of the lower right corner.

  • y – The y-coordinate of the lower right corner.

static get_coords_from_svg(svg)[source]

Extracts coordinates from an SVG string and returns them as a list of dictionaries.

Parameters:

svg – The SVG string.

Returns:

A list of dictionaries with box coordinates.

make_svg_string()[source]

Generates an SVG string representation of the box.

Returns:

The SVG string.
